thread.title: Doctor Strange Villain Gets Bloody In New Deleted Scene
thread.title_full: Doctor Strange Villain Gets Bloody In New Deleted Scene

author: Joseph Schmidt
title: Doctor Strange Villain Gets Bloody In New Deleted Scene
text:
Doctor Strange Villain Gets Bloody In New Deleted Scene Joseph Schmidt Start Photo Gallery Back to Article Image of 
Say what you will about Doctor Strange ’s bad guy, but Kaecilius knows his scripture. 
The latest deleted scene hyping up the forthcoming Blu-Ray release of Marvel Studios mind-bending adventure shows how Kaecilius and his gang of minions secure their holy hideout. 
After trading knowledge of the Good Book, Mads Mikkelsen ’s villainous character pledges to prove to a priest that there’s no such thing as an afterlife. 
The priest assures him no such thing can be proven, but then Kaecilius summons his shadow spears. 
How rude! In a House of God, no less. That should be, hmmm, eight Hail Mary’s.
